title: "Welcome to League Unlocked"?
body:
I'm not really sure which board to put this in, so I'll put it in miscellaneous. I logged onto my account earlier, and I got [this](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/166738220866994176/403027217187078148/unknown.png), and have no clue what it is or how i got it. Hovering over it, it says "Welcome to League Unlocked, you are receiving extra rewards! 139 unlocked champions."
Does anyone know why I got htis and what this does?

replies.body:
As I understand it it's a partnership with certain PC cafes and events, where while you play at the cafe/event you have access to all champs and some XP bonuses.

Afaik it'll go away once you go back to playing at home (if you ever do).

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6vsjtm/league_unlocked_suddenly_unlocked_every_champion/

I just had the same thing happen. I just finished a local league tournament which would lead me to think that's why I have it. I do own all the champions so it really isn't doing anything at the moment. I guess it's cool to have, but I'm not sure how long i'll have it.
